Dash of Flavor- Elemental Effects

Here is a list of effects for each elemental type.

2nd is the secondary damage that Lore skill adds to
Effect You can only see the added effect once the
element type is added to an attack

Note To add an element to a Skill you need to go into
the Customizing screen. Press square and move until you
are next to one of the boxes on an assigned Skill. Press X
and choose one of the elements you know the lore for. The
elemental icon will be next to that attack and the effects
above will be added. Some attacks cannot be modified. See
our Skill charts for details on which can and can't be
enhanced.

Forgot... D Knight deserves Kudos for telling me how to add elements.
